== Musalmanwadi (565591) ==

Musalmanwadi is a village in the [[Ratnagiri]] taluka of [[Ratnagiri]] district with an area of 4 hectares and harbouring 231 households with total population of 1010 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Ratnagiri]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 462 and female population is 548. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 565591<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 390 (84.42%)
* Literate female population: 442 (80.66%)
